languages.text: {n}Маражай следит за вами из под полуопущенных век — оценивающе, словно вычисляя, насколько вы опасны для него. Затем он отводит взгляд и начинает подчеркнуто небрежно изучать свой доспех.{/n}

{n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай следит за вами из под полуопущенных век — оценивающе, словно вычисляя, насколько вы опасны для него. Затем он отводит взгляд и начинает подчеркнуто небрежно изучать свой доспех.{/n}

{n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋低垂的目光注视着你，似乎在试着评估你究竟能造成多大的威胁。随后，他移开了目光，故意装出一副不以为然的样子，检查起了自己的护甲。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋低垂的目光注视着你，似乎在试着评估你究竟能造成多大的威胁。随后，他移开了目光，故意装出一副不以为然的样子，检查起了自己的护甲。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは下がったまぶたの下からこちらをジッと見つめる…その視線は、こちらがどれだけ怖れているか見極めているようだ。それから目をそらして、どうでも良さそうに自分の防具を点検し始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは下がったまぶたの下からこちらをジッと見つめる…その視線は、こちらがどれだけ怖れているか見極めているようだ。それから目をそらして、どうでも良さそうに自分の防具を点検し始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sigue tus movimientos con la mirada a través de sus párpados entornados; te examina atentamente, como si tratase de discernir cuánta amenaza supones para él. Luego aparta la mirada y comienza a inspeccionar su armadura con evidente indiferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sigue tus movimientos con la mirada a través de sus párpados entornados; te examina atentamente, como si tratase de discernir cuánta amenaza supones para él. Luego aparta la mirada y comienza a inspeccionar su armadura con evidente indiferencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sous ses paupières baissées, Marazhai ne vous lâche pas des yeux. Il vous jauge du regard comme pour tenter de deviner si vous représentez une menace, puis il se détourne pour inspecter son armure avec une nonchalance délibérée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sous ses paupières baissées, Marazhai ne vous lâche pas des yeux. Il vous jauge du regard comme pour tenter de deviner si vous représentez une menace, puis il se détourne pour inspecter son armure avec une nonchalance délibérée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verfolgt unter gesenkten Augenlidern deine Bewegungen – dabei scheint er dich mit seinem Blick zu mustern, als wolle er herausfinden, ob du eine Bedrohung darstellst. Dann wendet er den Blick ab und beginnt, unbekümmert seine Rüstung zu inspizieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verfolgt unter gesenkten Augenlidern deine Bewegungen – dabei scheint er dich mit seinem Blick zu mustern, als wolle er herausfinden, ob du eine Bedrohung darstellst. Dann wendet er den Blick ab und beginnt, unbekümmert seine Rüstung zu inspizieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, indirdiği göz kapaklarının ardından seni izliyor. Ne derece tehlike teşkil ettiğini çözmeye çalışırcasına bakışlarıyla seni ölçüp biçiyor. Ardından bakışlarını çevirerek sert bir kayıtsızlıkla zırhını incelemeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tracks you from beneath his lowered lids — his gaze is appraising, as though trying to work out how much of a threat you pose. Then he looks away and begins inspecting his armour with pointed nonchalance.{/n}
